column5: Looks like one of the Wallenda's has permission to cross into Canada over Niagara Falls via wire. Article says it will add $120 million to the local economy.$120 million? Really??Nimstug...but he still can only bring in one case of beer duty free.http://www.cbc.ca/news/offbeat/story...a.html?cmp=rss
That is good news and if the econimic impact is only 10% of that it will be a plus.
Wow, $120 million - Let's get the guy to walk into the US instead. Let's see, $120 million times 365 days a year... Bill
I wonder if the border patrol has plans to meet him half-way and check the passport?
I agree 120 mil who came up with that number & how will he balance the case of beer. I'm confusedoops!! it says one day 20 mil impact. The will just raise the price of beer for a day!!!
Will that be US or Canadian eh?!
With the exchange rate Canada wins!!!!
Will he be okay if he does not touch ground and just turns around and walks right back? :-) Maybe he can video phone in.
